channel.title: Dark bow glitching
channel.description:
Is there anyway to patch dark bow glitching? my dark bow spec still hit normally when you spec such as 40's but when the kidz glitch they hit 60-147 and it make pking rly bad :( would be really apreciated if you could help me fixing that :)
Doeb: 317 Base: Delta (EvolutionX)

item.title: Dark bow glitching
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && !specOn){ DDS2Damg3 = true; ddsInterval = 250; lastDds = System.currentTimeMillis(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && specialAmount > 74 && specOn && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0){ specialAtk(true, 75, -1, -1); //327 dbowspec = 2; actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specAttack(); usingSpecial = true; }

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && !specOn){ DDS2Damg = true; ddsInterval = 250; lastDds = System.currentTimeMillis(); startAnimation(426); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } if(specOn){ if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && specialAmount > 74){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, -1, 426); hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit2()); rangeGFXNPC(85, -1); rangeGFXNPC(65, -1); }

Read full topic

item.title: Dark bow glitching
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Its declared in both the special and in the max hit calculator, adding them both together to one big bonus, delete the bonus on either the spec or the max hit calculation.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark bow glitching
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

then its declared in the special it self.

item.title: Dark bow glitching
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

item = 4827	Dark_bow	A_Dark_Bow.	1000000000	100000000	100000000	0	0	0	0	200	0	0	0	0	0	0	0

200, dont think it the problem.

item.title: Dark bow glitching
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:2, topic:342309”]its overpowered; change its bonus’s.
item config[/quote]
But Delta doesn’t use item bonuses to calculate range hits.
